comments.author: markk1
comments.body: Good job! More articles and information for people who do not understand the intricacies of the casino!

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: Thank you Markk1!Do let us know if you have any topics you would like us to write about.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCasinoGeeks on June 27, 2023, 04:44:48 PMDo let us know if you have any topics you would like us to write about. Add your official website URL on the OP so that it can be visit easily with single click.For the topic suggestion, I’m really interested to see if the RTP of specific slot games varies per casino and if there’s a slot game provider that offers an open source code to verify all spin result. Another topic I’m interested is what’s the popular live games provider right now and what country they are popular the most. This research will help us understand what’s provider dominates the live casino market and what country contributes a lot for this industry. This data will be useful for casino targeted ads.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, I was thinking if you could merge your first post and your second post together since they are all from you and serve the same purpose. It will be nice you fix that up so as to make this thread well coordinated as your introduction page is a bit empty and scanty. Doing this will cover up those lapses your are trying to avoid. So it would be in your best interest to do so and lastly while doing that, do well to furnish this platform with concrete details and information of your review page so we could flow well before attempting visiting your page because it is what you present here that entices us to visit your website.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I already commented on this in the past and I will repeat myself, your site has a good designer, it is strange that you have not added many casinos on your site, even here in the forum you can see these many reliable casinos, the reviews that are on your site they are all based on your own experience, I suppose that's it. but the issue here that I saw on your site is that you didn't put an option for people to comment on the experiences they had with each casino that they created an account through your site. you had to put a scam casinos category, you should also put a dispute resolution categoryI think this would make you able to compete with the already established sites, I'm talking about sites like casino.guro, trustpilot and askgambler, I also found it very unnecessary to keep putting things in your thread like warning people to be courteous, not to post spam or self-promotion, and post only accurate and relevant information. I assume you didn't do much research on this section of the forum before creating this thread. in any case good luck with your site and I wish you much success

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: OP, your advert is empty with only write ups. You should buy a corper membership so that you can have a quality and good presentation of your site. You should give more details about your site.We have reputable casinos in the forum and you need to try and meet up with their standard if you want to go into competition with them. You don't need to warn anybody on how to comment on your site because it is them that will give you a proper review on your site.Welcome to the forum

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: The design of your site is okay on Mobile phone, I haven't tried to on laptop though.It would be better to add more casino reviews to your site because having to go back to your site only to see few reviews is not good, it will discourage others from ever going to your site.For now, try as much as possible to add more reviews to your site talk to companies (we have several casinos here in the forum that are yet to be reviewed by you) talk to them and add them to your site that way if anyone is going to your site they'll be a new review to read.

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.created_time: June 28, 2023, 03:37:37 PMLast edit: June 28, 2023, 06:20:41 PM by CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: Thanks a lot everybody! I wasn't expecting quite so much engagement, that why my OP is so basic , I will keep working on it.The site is relatively new, it's been online for about a month and I know I still have quite a bit of work ahead of me. You should buy a corper membership so that you can have a quality and good presentation of your site. You should give more details about your site.To be honest, I'd like to try and get Full Membership by being active and contributing. Thank you for your suggestions

comments.author: Mahdirakib
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCasinoGeeks on June 28, 2023, 04:44:27 PMTo be honest, I'd like to try and get Full Membership by being active and contributing. But I know it can take a while, so I don't fully discard the possibility of buying it.  Do you know GamblingBro? He has been making constructive review of each casino with his own experience. His reviews are pretty good and helpful for the gambling community. Still, GamblingBro hasn't reached Full Member rank in two years. For now, I think it is better for you to buy a copper membership to make everything looks better. You have added 6 casinos review link in the OP. 3 casinos are owned and operated by the same team among those six casinos. Try to publish the review of different popular casinos.BTW, don't make consecutive posts. It is against the rules of the forum.

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: Thank you for the heads up! I merged both posts and deleted the second one.I did not know GamblingBro, no doubt he put the work in, somebody make that man a full member! I will reconsider paying for a membership.

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks

comments.body: Read our latest review! This time we chose to dissect Bitcasino.io.Do you agree with our score? Have you used this casino? Let us know!

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.created_time: July 21, 2023, 09:14:25 PMLast edit: July 24, 2023, 09:32:14 PM by CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: We reviewed Betfury, a casino we tried and loved!Check our three step guide on how to play FunFury Battle1. Make bank – collect as many FunFury coins as possible during the tournament, this will give you an upper hand. Don’t do this ahead of time, as these coins are reset every time a battle starts.     1.1. Spin the Fury Wheel at the beginning – it’s pretty clear that with no deposit this will give you 8000-10000 funCoins, which works great for us!     1.2. Claim the Fury Box once every hour – for an extra 300 FunFury to play with.2. Low Risk Start – Choose a high RTP game and set it to a 50/50 chance of winning, Dice works great for this. Set your bet somewhere between 20-100; a lower bet will make your progress slower but it will also help accommodate long losing streaks. Turn on fast mode, configure the autobet and let it run for as long as possible.3. High Risk Ending – Remember you won’t get to keep any of the FunFury coins you accumulated. If you still have some bankroll near the end you can start betting more aggressively. At this point we recommend you start playing manually for added control.We did this a couple of times and it works like a charm. We managed to reach the 9th spot which earned us $2.63, this isn’t a lot of money, but every bit counts!Read the full review here!

Hope to see duelbits also in their list.And regarding the top 5 casinos, hope to see the list will change once they have more reviewed casinos.Doing the review, should not be in a hurry also. They can take all their time so we would read a valuable insight from their end.

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on July 21, 2023, 09:56:27 PMQuote from: Cantsay on June 27, 2023, 10:03:06 PMThe design of your site is okay on Mobile phone, I haven't tried to on laptop though.It would be better to add more casino reviews to your site because having to go back to your site only to see few reviews is not good, it will discourage others from ever going to your site.For now, try as much as possible to add more reviews to your site talk to companies (we have several casinos here in the forum that are yet to be reviewed by you) talk to them and add them to your site that way if anyone is going to your site they'll be a new review to read.We are seeing that he's adding more casinos so give them time to conduct their comprehensive review.Also, at least they are reviewing familiar sites found in the forum. Hope to see duelbits also in their list.And regarding the top 5 casinos, hope to see the list will change once they have more reviewed casinos.Doing the review, should not be in a hurry also. They can take all their time so we would read a valuable insight from their end.Maybe he is just itchy because the casino review site isn't that new already. They are almost a month old now so some will think it's enough to have a good number of casinos displayed on their platform. Well for me, it's not about quantity that matters but it's about quality. So, I don't mind seeing a small number of casino listed on their site as long as the reviews are well-detailed and most importantly honest.Another thing that I like about them is like you said, they mostly review sites that are popular here in Bitcointalk. They will surely add Duelbits soon and yeah I also think the rankings can still change because casinos performance can also change sometimes.

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: Thank you for all the feedback! We will add Duelbits to our backlog. As you guys said right now we don't have a lot of reviews right but we strive to add more every week. We want to provide quality reviews with up-to-date information, and unfortunately that takes time.Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on July 22, 2023, 04:07:42 PMI am always curious to know what these review websites write about different gambling sites. But for some reason I can not load your site from my side. I see the following error.It seems like our hosting service had some downtime over the weekend, it should be up right now if you want to give it another try.

comments.author: CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.created_time: July 28, 2023, 09:59:35 PMLast edit: July 31, 2023, 02:17:51 PM by CryptoCasinoGeeks
comments.body: We reviewed FairspinGenerally we try to review casinos we think we will like, we liked the possibility to stake this casino's token. But we didn't like what we found.Check out their insane wagering requirements!Bonuses and PromotionsWelcome bonuses on this casino have pretty stringent 60x wagering requirements and only 3 days to unlock. On top of this some games don't fully count towards your overall wagering. Slots is the only one that contributes 100%, but all other games contribute between 5% and 10%.As if this wasn't enough its a take-all scheme, you either unlock it all or you get nothing at all.For example, your first deposit is 100 USD so you get a bonus of 50 USD and 30 free spins. Let's say those 30 spins get you an extra 10 USD bringing the bonus up to 60 USD. If you play slots the wagering requirement is then 3600 USD. But if you play Blackjack only 5% of your wagers count towards the total requirement, so you would have to bet 72000 USD.Read the full review here!

Slots is the only one that contributes 100%, but all other games contribute between 5% and 10%.As if this wasn't enough its a take-all scheme, you either unlock it all or you get nothing at all.For example, your first deposit is 100 USD so you get a bonus of 50 USD and 30 free spins. But if you play Blackjack only 5% of your wagers count  towards the total requirement, so you would have to bet 72000 USD.Read the full review here!Fairspin team should seriously consider about your review about them. Maybe, time to rectify their wagering requirements and other conditions.Because once players read your comprehensive review, they may change their mind and not play on this site. Sometimes a good review will save you from headache or disappointment. And so some will skip from creating their account on the site. So just continue what you are doing as for sure, some users here will find it useful in their crypto gambling journey.
